pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:5.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:5.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kulesu nimantitā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:5.3: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chabbaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vosāsantiyo ṭhitā honti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:6.1: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:6.2: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivāressantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:6.3: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivārethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:6.6: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivāressatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:6.7: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:6.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:7.1: “Bhikkhū paneva kulesu nimantitā bhuñjanti, tatra ce sā bhikkhunī vosāsamānarūpā ṭhitā hoti—‘idha sūpaṃ detha, idha odanaṃ dethā’ti, tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā— ‘apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī’ti. Ekassa cepi bhikkhuno na paṭibhāseyya taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apasādetuṃ— ‘apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī’ti paṭidesetabbaṃ tehi bhikkhūhi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:7.2: ‘gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjimhā asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemā’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:8.2: kulaṃ nāma cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṃ, brāhmaṇakulaṃ, vessakulaṃ, suddakulaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:9.2: pañcannaṃ bhojanānaṃ aññatarena bhojanena nimantitā bhuñjanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:11.2: yathāmittatā yathāsandiṭṭhatā yathāsambhattatā yathāsamānupajjhāyakatā yathāsamānācariyakatā— “idha sūpaṃ detha, idha odanaṃ dethā”ti. Esā vosāsantī nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:14.1: Tehi bhikkhūhi sā bhikkhunī apasādetabbā— “apasakka tāva, bhagini, yāva bhikkhū bhuñjantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:14.2: Ekassa cepi bhikkhuno anapasādito— “khādissāmi bhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:15.1: Upasampannāya upasampannasaññī vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:15.2: Upasampannāya vematiko vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:15.3: Upasampannāya anupasampannasaññī vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd2:16.1: Ekatoupasampannāya vosāsantiyā na nivāreti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
